name: Clin M Corpus Sarcoma
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note 1:**  When both FIGO stage and metastatic detail are available, record the code with metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage. 

**Note 2:**  FIGO Stage IV, NOS is assigned based on tumor extension and/or metastasis.  Code distant metastasis based on a physician's statement of FIGO Stage IV, NOS only if it is known that the stage value is assigned because of metastasis.

    Superficial inguinal
